title: v 6.23 wont let me log in with correct username/password combo
body: League won't let me log in some times, like I'll open the client and enter my username and password and it won't let me in. It randomly decides when it wants to let me play, is anyone else havign this problem?

replies.body:
We're very much past 6.23 now. If your patcher is listing that version, you may have a bad patch applied. I'd recommend grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to run the *Force Repatch* action, as this should resolve the issue.

Please let me know if this worked!
